review: Totally Love My Fire TV! It is easy to install and easy to use!
author: Mitzi Herring

review: I like it, it will do 100% of what I need once HBO Now comes out on it.
author: joel

review: It took awhile to get it up and running and a call to customer service tech. With his help it is up and going fine now. I can watch WWE NETWORK on my TV instead of my laptop. Which is why I wanted the FireTV. I love it plus I can rent or.buy movies as I want
author: Gloria

review: Have had a Roku for last 2 years which works well but the features & ease of use with the Fire surpasses the Roku, Fire Rocks!!!
author: Kindle Customer "Phil.h"

review: Worth every penny. I love this box. With this and my Apple TV I can have all of the programming I want and not pay additional for it.
author: R. R. Klepper "Dr Bob"

review: Good product and resolution is excellent; but the remote is not easy to use. It takes some time to be familier with it.
author: Bhushan Lakhe

review: No many things to say bad about it, now that i finally got a new netflix app that works.
author: Steve Heaton

review: Bye bye cable. This works great.
author: Hansen L
